text: "Wonderful Christmastime" is a Christmas song which was first recorded by Paul McCartney and released in 1979. The single did not chart on the Billboard Hot 100 in the United States. It reached #6 on United Kingdom music charts. This single is played during the Christmas season worldwide. Other singers, including Kelly Rowland of Destiny's Child, Hilary Duff and Demi Lovato have covered this song throughout the years. It did finally debut on Billboardâ€™s Hot 100 12/29/18 and again charted in late 2023 reaching its peak #26 on 1/6/24 and spending 13 weeks total. ==References== Category:Christmas songs Category:1979 songs Category:Paul McCartney songs Category:Demi Lovato songs Category:Kylie Minogue songs
title: Wonderful Christmastime
